name: grungo jump fly
description:
Original project completion date: April 2022

grungo jump fly! A game made in one week because I was bored.

To hell or bust! Use your 3 guns and the power of weapon quickswapping to fly around 29 action packed levels (i ran out of ideas)

Every level has multiple solutions! You can use the glue gun to build platforms, the grapple hook to swing past obstacles, or the shotgun to fling yourself. Beating levels will require a mix of creativity and execution.
